analysis.description:
Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/13/0x35ae44bc4e3186ca732efa09a459cf93fa491a47.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/13/0x35ae44bc4e3186ca732efa09a459cf93fa491a47.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/13/0x35ae44bc4e3186ca732efa09a459cf93fa491a47.sol#85) is not in mixedCase
